"A.P.238/4/9/11:30": "Heheh, this is fun. The way you fight is getting more and more sophisticated."
"Sometimes when I see you dart around in the corner of my eyes I get shivers, you've really grown."
"Lisa's eyes aren't confused. Other parts maybe, but Lisa is confident in her eyes."
"You in particular gave off a special feeling. It made Lisa feel small."

"You can become the strongest of all. Lisa's eyes don't make mistakes,
it's already certain."
"Don't you want to become the strongest and kill enemies slowly and kill them and kill them and kill them?"
"Hahahaha! Hey there, participants! I hope you're enjoying yourselves!"
"Huey, Huey! I want to take part too! Let me join in!"
"You're part of the staff... Ahem... time to report the current standing!"
"...Right now, the pair in the lead is the Ranger Lisa and <%me>!"
"Oh, I think I've heard that name before..."

"...I mean, isn't this score a bit too high? But if they're that strong,
that's OK!"
"Next, the pair of the Force Marlu and the Hunter Ohza!"
"But it seems like the rumored Information Sisters are also working hard!"
"Who?"
"Nonetheless, it's neck-and-neck! The ARKS Battle Championship is a fierce struggle! The tide could turn at any moment!"
"Hey, Huey. Aren't you just reading from your notes? How's that fun?"
"The second half of the game begins here, so we expect you to do your best! That's all!"
"Look, Claris Claes. I know that becoming an adult can be a sad thing. But sometimes we need to follow the script."
"For now, let's read up about the participants."
"Are you alright? Did you push yourself too hard in the first half?"
"That doesn't matter. I'll do more in the second half."
